ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Stat. Mech is a course that utilizes statistical approaches to solve problems otherwise inaccessable by other techniques. I would recommend a course covering this material, although I would probably not recommend this specific course as taught.
Students who are to do research in computational chemistry will benefit a lot from this course.

I would summarize it as a very good introductory course on Classical and Quantum Statistical Mechanics, covering a wide range of topics of interest for all of Chemists, Physicists and Engineers, and I would definitely recommend it to everyone interested in learning the subject, due to its comprehensiveness.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
